attributes.additional_details: Self employed have used their money to live for the last year, paying mortgages, rent, bills, food and trying to stay afloat during the pandemic, we need time to raise the money again and a lot of us cannot pay on 31st January 2020 when we haven't worked for nearly a year.
attributes.background: Give self employed workers more time to raise money again to pay for their self assessment return

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558528

If you want the deadline to be extended to a different date we could accept a petition requesting this.
